featured.text: This information came from a very _____ source, so you don’t have to worry about being cheated.
They were upset because they felt he had cheated them.
While winning a gold _____ is what every Olympic athlete dreams of, it becomes meaningless if it is achieved by cheating.

definition.en_def: To act dishonestly or unfairly in order to gain an advantage.
definition.example: He tried to cheat on the exam by looking at his neighbor's paper.
